comments:
When I start the 0517 build, I end up with exceptions in the .log. Am running 
with warn=true.

The first exception is expected, but the second exception is not. It looks like 
the same bug I thought you fixed before the build input (...x.jar\ does not 
exist).

Because in 0517, ant.ui_2.0.0 does not contain plugin.xml but plugin.xml.off and
thus is not recognized by the site as a plugin

traces.message: D:\eclipse builds\eclipse20020517-1 \workspace\.metadata\.config\platform.cfg.metadata\LocalSite.xml (The system  cannot find the file specified)
The file D:/eclipse builds/eclipse20020517- 1/plugins/org.eclipse.ant.ui_2.0.0.jar\ does not exist.
